SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_YAML_CONTENT# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either YAML file path or content." :ENDIF @echo off
!------------------------------------------ Building java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "GetYAMLAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_YML_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_YAML_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_YML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YML_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! yaml : IF &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_FILE_PATH# : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_YAML_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_YML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YML_CMD#, " -yamlfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_ELEMENT_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_YML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YML_CMD#, " -elementpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_YML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YML_CMD#, " -fail &UC4RB_YAML_FAIL#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_YML_CMD#
&UC4RB_YML_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET YAML CONTENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET YAML CONTENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_YAML_DATA# = "" :SET &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_JSN_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_YAML_DATA" : SET &UC4RB_YAML_DATA# = &VALUE# : CASE "UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS" : SET &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS# = &VALUE# : ENDSWITCH : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_YAML_CONTENT# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_TMP_FILE :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_YAML_DATA#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_YAML_VALUE_EXISTS#,,"WORKFLOW"
